Summary: five of us was riding west on schillingers rd,we saw two big objects in sky just above trees,they where stopped,then started slowly moving apart,one had five,the other had six
divs: Sighting Detailsfirst off i was out looking for ufos,i have seen,and got on video strange objects,in our skys around here,its like the past two weeks,we see them every night,and day,we have seen what looks like orange-red balls,and they are not weather ballons,one i have on video has a chemtrail coming out of it,then you see no trail,and it just moves across the sky,in the day time.last friday night we saw a very big ufo,it had four lights,one two the left,one spaced above it two the right,and one in the middle at the bottom,and one behind it,they all was moving like a blimp,very slowly,across schillingers by the train track,then about what looked like 200ft,they stopped,went slowly down,then fast they all moved together and shot up,and was gone,i dont have this one on video,but last night there was five of us moving west on schillingers towards airport blvd,first road on right,just past the train track,about seven at night we saw two of what i seen last friday,i dont no what they are,there not planes,they did not move,i stopped my truck,got out and started video recording it,all i could see was the lights,the one on the left,had a red light that slowly moved from it to the left across the sky,until it was gone,we watched both ufo's for about five mintues,then it was like they turned out the lights,and they where gone,i could tell you more stories but i need to get it all on video,so i am going back out tonight,something is going on around here,
trends: There have been no other sightings in Semmes
This sighting has never been favorited.
